scripts.beforePublish: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.toFirst: npm run beforePublish && npm run release -- --first-release && npm publish
scripts.toPreview: npm run beforePublish && npm run release -- --prerelease bate && npm publish
scripts.toPatch: npm run beforePublish && npm run release -- --prerelease-as patch && npm publish
scripts.toMinor: npm run beforePublish && npm run release -- --prerelease-as minor && npm publish
scripts.toMajor: npm run beforePublish && npm run release -- --prerelease-as major && npm publish
